data.title: Cédric A. Bashengezi on LinkedIn: #work #job #growth

data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

9 years ago, my sister and I chose to move to America for college. I graduated with the hope that my degree would open many doors for me and it certainly has! While searching for a job, I dreamt of a job that treated its employees like family, offered growth opportunity, and wanted to work where I’d be excited, motivated and engaged in my day to day responsibilities. I feel blessed to have found it all at The Goodwin Company, while giving me the opportunity to live in a land in which life is better, richer and fuller for everyone. #work #job #growth
